q: Mike Pence is not officially jumping into the race for Indiana governor just yet. The congressman said he expects to make a decision`` later this year'' about his next step, but made clear that his calling is closer to home. With former Sen. Hopefully, they change it. He's a quarterback, too. He's the same as everybody else. Just because he's maybe a little bit more athletic and faster and can run, he shouldn't be penalized.
